Articles.Content:
Hi! New jet is out!

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/mDYfI)

[DOWNLOAD](https://www.sendspace.com/file/eitn39)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/OuGrPGfM0j4?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-05T18:38:05Z" title="05/05/2015 06:38  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 5, 2015</time> by Mareczex333**

> 
> This is amazing.

Thanks! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) It may look not manueverable, but it is! Just drop missiles out ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Yay Mareczex333 is back! 

 Good to see you mate, and nice clean lines on that plane too! GJ.

Most of the replicas I see are very adorable for some reason

This is no exception xD

Yay ! Nice one ! We don't see much french planes here ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

The thing is... Mirages dont have canards ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

There was a variant of the Mirage III that had fixed canards just above the beginning of the wing, but not that much in the front ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

But still, looks very good ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

I should modify mine to work in 1.0

I wanted to make it easier to control. Canards are based on euro fighter typhoon plane. Thats why I named it just mirage, without dassault word.

I'm happy that u like it ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Now craft in motion! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Have fun with it!

Beautiful! I like the area rule fuselage particularly (that's the wasp-waist section in the middle). I wonder if the transonic area rule works in 1.x.x.

[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Area_rule](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Area_rule)

edit: +rep

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-05T21:49:18Z" title="05/05/2015 09:49  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 5, 2015</time> by Josh Harris**
  
add rep
